text: @ImpishMis30 @StephenAtHome @DrLaPook @Publix in FL where I live, they SELL their delish buttercream frosting in the fridge. I’ve resisted, bt now may be the time. I doubt I’ll be round for the next plague! Oh, when I moved from BOS to ATL, I bought my home, as new Publix had just gone into a strip mall.Jonesin’ some
